summary_short: Dmitri Karamazov is the most connected figure (74 ties).
highlights: Most central: Dmitri Karamazov (74), Alyosha Karamazov (64), Fyodor Karamazov (39), Ivan Karamazov (31)
story_summary: Mitya recounts his actions on the day of his father's death, insisting he did not kill him and describing secret signals known only to himself, his father, and Smerdyakov. The prosecutor suggests the murder was committed through the garden door, not the window, and hints at Smerdyakov's possible involvement, which Mitya denies, expressing contempt for Smerdyakov's character. Mitya reveals his intention to commit suicide, refuses to disclose the source of a large sum of money, and consents to a thorough search of his person and clothes.
evidence_quotes: I didnâ€™t kill him; you see, my guardian angel saved me
The murder was committed in the room and not through the window
